text: Ara muminadera pakse sangata naya ye tara ekajote beriye parabe. Sutaram tadera madhyera pratyeka gotra theke kena ekati dala beriye pare na dharme jnananusilana karate, yara phale tara yena nija nija sampradayake satarka karate pare yakhana tara phire ase tadera kache yate tara sabadhana hate pare
